data.text: “Arise, shine; for your light has come,
For behold, darkness will cover the earth,
Nations will come to your light,
“Lift up your eyes all around, and see:
Then you shall see and be radiant,
A multitude of camels will cover you,
All the flocks of Kedar will be gathered together to you.
“Who are these who fly as a cloud,
Surely the islands will wait for me,
“Foreigners will build up your walls,
Your gates also shall be open continually; they shall not be shut day nor night, that men may bring to you the wealth of the nations, and their kings led captive.
For that nation and kingdom that will not serve you shall perish; yes, those nations shall be utterly wasted.
“The glory of Lebanon shall come to you, the cypress tree, the pine, and the box tree together, to beautify the place of my sanctuary; and I will make the place of my feet glorious.
The sons of those who afflicted you will come bowing to you;
“Whereas you have been forsaken and hated,
You will also drink the milk of the nations,
For bronze I will bring gold;
Violence shall no more be heard in your land,
The sun will be no more your light by day,
Your sun will not go down any more,
Then your people will all be righteous.
The little one will become a thousand,
